desc: Inspirational high quality products, service & advice for knitting & crochet. Beautiful yarn and wool in different fibres from NZ and overseas, a full range of notions, NZ's largest range of needles - all in one place. Shop at our friendly Kingsland store in Auckland NZ, or browse the store online.

layout.text: Outlaw Yarns Gothic now in store

The 2022 limited edition of this popular yarn is here!
A blend of Black Alpaca, Polwarth and Possum in stunning colours - this yarn will sell fast!
